org.thegalactic.io

Interface Reader<E>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - The class of elements to read.

    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContextSerializerBurmeister, ContextSerializerCsv, ContextSerializerFIMI, ContextSerializerSLF, ContextSerializerText, ImplicationalSystemSerializerText

    public interface Reader<E>

    This interface defines a standard way for reading a context.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void read(E e, BufferedReader file)
      Read a context to a file.

      • read

   throws IOException

        Read a context to a file.

        Throws:
        IOException - When an IOException occurs
